effectTexts.civilian: Add +1 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S +1 STRUCTURE to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: They're just heavy bags with sand. Not much else to say, but they'll slow down an attack from a fiend. Good luck, you'll need it!
flavorTexts.fiend: You've spotted a pretty bad STRUCTURE in this BUNKER. Time to do some damage.

effectTexts.civilian: Add +1 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S +1 STRUCTURE to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: They're not electric or barbed but this fence will take a bit of a beating before failing on you. Good luck, you'll need it!
flavorTexts.fiend: That's not much of a barrier between you and them. Just hop over!

effectTexts.civilian: Add +2 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S STRUCTURE(S) equaling up to +2 to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: You have re-enforced your BUNKER with steel doors. It might not be enough to protect against an attacking FIEND. Be careful!
flavorTexts.fiend: Enough force will definitely break the brace on that door, no problem!

effectTexts.civilian: Add +2 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S STRUCTURE(S) equaling up to +2 to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: You have lined your BUNKER with sharp, barbed wire. It might not be enough to protect against an attacking FIEND. Be careful!
flavorTexts.fiend: You have spotted some weak BUNKER STRUCTURES that will fail with enough force.

effectTexts.civilian: Add +3 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S STRUCTURE(S) equaling up to +3 to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: Hard concrete walls might be a great solution to protect yourself. Although, it might only be a temporary solution. Be vigilant!
flavorTexts.fiend: Even the toughest walls have a weak point to exploit. Give it a good smack!

effectTexts.civilian: Add +3 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S STRUCTURE(S) equaling up to +3 to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: Hard concrete walls might be a great solution to protect yourself. Although, it might only be a temporary solution. Be vigilant!
flavorTexts.fiend: Even the toughest walls have a weak point to exploit. Give it a good smack!

effectTexts.civilian: Add +3 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S STRUCTURE(S) equaling up to +3 to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: Weatherproof and durable, metal panels are a great addition. Although, it might only be a temporary solution. Be vigilant!
flavorTexts.fiend: A few loose screws is all you need to take down even the heaviest steel walls.

effectTexts.civilian: Add +3 to your BUNKER.
effectTexts.fiend: Send any CIVILIAN'S STRUCTURE(S) equaling up to +3 to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: Looks like someone left their BUNKER behind. It’s free for you to use. It’ll take some dynamite to bring this down. Be thankful!
flavorTexts.fiend: Did they actually leave the back door open? Time to do some serious damage.

effectTexts.civilian: Force a BUNKER to COLLAPSE.
effectTexts.fiend: Force a BUNKER to COLLAPSE.

flavorTexts.civilian: Uh-oh! Looks like your neighbor’s BUNKER is about to COLLAPSE. I’m sure it wasn’t your fault...right?
flavorTexts.fiend: That support beam looks quite important. I wonder what would happen if you attacked it. Only one way to find out!

effectTexts.civilian: Add a STRUCTURE (at x2 value) to another’s BUNKER. Maybe it’ll COLLAPSE. NO TAKE BACKS! Place with a STRUCTURE to signify x2 value.
effectTexts.fiend: Add a STRUCTURE (at x2 value) to another’s BUNKER. Maybe it’ll COLLAPSE. NO TAKE BACKS! Place with a STRUCTURE to signify x2 value.

flavorTexts.civilian: Your neighbor’s BUNKER is looking a little shabby. Why not help them out?
flavorTexts.fiend: Let's try and help out a CIVILIAN for a change. Or not! Maybe something will break!

effectTexts.civilian: Take another CIVILIAN'S STRUCTURE and add it to your own.
effectTexts.fiend: Choose any two like valued STRUCTURES and send them to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: Looks like your neighbor has just the STRUCTURE you need.
flavorTexts.fiend: Sometimes the tools to tear down walls is right in front of you. Take one STRUCTURE to destroy another STRUCTURE.

effectTexts.civilian: Choose a player and look at their hand and take a card of your choice.
effectTexts.fiend: Choose a player and look at their hand and take a card of your choice.

flavorTexts.civilian: One man's garbage is another man's treasure. Oh... was that not garbage?
flavorTexts.fiend: You're convinced that a CIVILIAN has the cure to this affliction. Time to find it!

effectTexts.civilian: Take another CIVILIAN'S entire BUNKER and either replace or add to your own.
effectTexts.fiend: Take a CIVILIAN'S BUNKER and make it yours. That CIVILIAN is now the new FIEND.

flavorTexts.civilian: Enough is enough! Time to kick your neighbor out of their bunker and make it yours!
flavorTexts.fiend: Here is your chance! Chase them out of their BUNKER and set yourself free.

effectTexts.civilian: Play two (2) STRUCTURE cards from your hand immediately.
effectTexts.fiend: Play two (2) of your STRUCTURE cards to remove two (2) CIVILIAN STRUCTURES or combine their value to remove one (1).

flavorTexts.civilian: You've learned how to cut down the time it takes to build STRUCTURES.
flavorTexts.fiend: You have a destructive frenzied attack.

effectTexts.civilian: Switch hands with another CIVILIAN.
effectTexts.fiend: Switch hands with another CIVILIAN.

flavorTexts.civilian: Your negotiating abilities are unmatched. YOu confidently convinced your neighbor to trade scraps for your garbage.
flavorTexts.fiend: You're not just a FIEND, you're a silver tongued devil. You've convinced a CIVILIAN that you're not a FIEND and you need to trade scrap.

effectTexts.civilian: Choose a player and skip their next turn.
effectTexts.fiend: Choose a player and skip their next turn.

flavorTexts.civilian: Everyone is extremely tired, especially your neighbors. Give them a well deserved rest.
flavorTexts.fiend: Your constant barrage has really tired your opponents. It's time for them to call it quits for a while.

effectTexts.civilian: Send everyone's strongest STRUCTURE to the SCRAPYARD.
effectTexts.fiend: Send everyone's strongest STRUCTURE to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: There is something off... It's an earthquake! Luckily You've secured your BUNKER. Too bad you didn't let anyone else know.
flavorTexts.fiend: Your fiendish senses have warned you of an upcoming earthquake. Take cover and watch the CIVILIANS scurry.

effectTexts.civilian: Immediately stop another CIVILIAN from building a +1 STRUCTURE.
effectTexts.fiend: Immediately (or on your turn) stop another CIVILIAN from building a +1 STRUCTURE.

flavorTexts.civilian: Your neighbor sure does act like he has a few screws loose. Lend a helping hand.
flavorTexts.fiend: It's not the heaviest in the arsenal but it'll loosen some screws and tear some bags.

effectTexts.civilian: Immediately stop another CIVILIAN from building a +2 STRUCTURE.
effectTexts.fiend: Immediately (or on your turn) stop another CIVILIAN from building a +2 STRUCTURE.

flavorTexts.civilian: I don't think your neighbor's BUNKER is cut out for the big leagues. Time to saw it down to size.
flavorTexts.fiend: Saw the hinges off a door or cut through some barbed wire, a hack saw can get the job done.

effectTexts.civilian: Immediately stop another CIVILIAN from building a +3 STRUCTURE.
effectTexts.fiend: Immediately (or on your turn) stop another CIVILIAN from building a +3 STRUCTURE.

flavorTexts.civilian: Is that a nail sticking out on your neighbor's STRUCTURE? A few good whacks should straighten that nail out!
flavorTexts.fiend: Metal panels and concrete walls are no match to the might of the sledgehammer.

effectTexts.civilian: Immediately stop another CIVILIAN from building a +5 STRUCTURE.
effectTexts.fiend: Immediately (or on your turn) stop another CIVILIAN from building a +5 STRUCTURE.

flavorTexts.civilian: Okay... this time no joking around we mean business. Time to bring that BUNKER down.
flavorTexts.fiend: Okay... this time no joking around we mean business. Time to bring that BUNKER down.

effectTexts.civilian: Immediately stop another player's action. If they played a card, it is sent to the SCRAPYARD.
effectTexts.fiend: Immediately stop another player's action. If they played a card, it is sent to the SCRAPYARD.

flavorTexts.civilian: No more being neighborly! Time to be assertive and stop your neighbor from getting ahead!
flavorTexts.fiend: Time to show some teeth, let 'em see those claws! Anything to stop them in their tracks.
